name: Planet Jumper (sox)
description:
A 3D planetary platformer with VOXEL DESTRUCTION!

Features

Don't Stop Moving: A constant rain of asteroids is following you destroying the path behind!

Make It To the End: Make your way to safety as quickly as possible by reaching the spaceship at the end.

Planet Gravity Go Weeeeee: Hop between worlds with gravitational fields to assist your journey.

Don't Run Out of Breath: Remember to collect oxygen tanks to survive, planets with atmospheres can keep you alive!

Controls & Tutorial

- Use W,A,S,D keys and mouse to navigate
the planet and avoid danger

- Press SPACEBAR to jump, allowing you
to reach other planets

- Pause the game at any time by pressing ESC

Other Notes

Planet Jumper was created for the DevSquad Academy Game Jam.

Made in Unreal Engine 4.

Big thanks to  Phyronnaz's Voxel Plugin Free  for Unreal Engine, without this plugin I would've been able to create these amazing voxel planets!
